It's a game that I can come back to and play a couple rounds whenever and just enjoy myself. I don't really know how else to explain it. I love R6 Siege.. but sometimes.. you have toreally be able to sit down and play for a while and immerse yourself into the whole thing.. and  sometimes i'm just not able to invest that kind of time or attention.. so this game is cool to play here and there without taking any personal vendetta with my lack of skills.
it was awesome, but please have a better VAC

This game is unplayable unless you are at a certain rank where everyone takes it seriously. Lower ranks are plagued with afk players, trolls, smurfs, and aimbot/wallhackers. Disgusting and unenjoyable to play. I can't get a single match where I'm just placed with ACTUAL bad people like myself, who want to play the game.

红信吃的莫名其妙，我人都傻了

Volví a jugar hace poco,desde la finalizacion de la opéracion wildfire que no jugaba,en su tiempo fue uno de los juegos que mas jugué en mi vida...al paso de las actualizaciones y cambios bruscos me termine frustrando, posteriormente dejándolo a un lado.Hace 2 semanas volví a darle una oportunidad, si bien la interfaz del menú no me gusta un carajo y mucho menos los  nuevos sonidos de las armas, me termine por adaptar y estoy volviendo a jugar...sin embargo la comunidad toxica y los hackers siguen estando presentes, pero al final del día es un muy buen juego para jugar con amigos y pasar el rato. Saludos.
melhor jogo de tiro da existência
One of the greatest games ever made. Can be a bit frustrating at times though. Must play with friends!!
